  • Classes in it.polimi.model used by it.polimi.client
    Class
    Description
    Bookshelf
    The bookshelf class represents personal bookshelf of each player
    CommonGoalCard
    The abstract class CommonGoalCard provides all the behaviour that are common between the 12 common goal cards
    GameView
    GameView class is meant to copy necessary attributes from game class and make it final, to pass through the network only "final" attributes and serialize them
    LivingRoomBoard
    LivingRoomBoard class represents the living room board on which the game is played
    ObjectCard
    ObjectCard class represents the cards placed in the tiles on the LivingRoomBoard
    PersonalGoalCard
    PersonalGoalCard class represents the personal goal card in the physical game
    Player
    Player class represents the single player
  • Classes in it.polimi.model used by it.polimi.controller
    Class
    Description
    Game
    Game class contains the actual game, identified by an id and containing all the necessary items to play
    ObjectCard
    ObjectCard class represents the cards placed in the tiles on the LivingRoomBoard
    PlayerChoice
    PlayerChoice class is meant to transform to final passed parameters, to pass through the network only "final" attributes and serialize them
  • Classes in it.polimi.model used by it.polimi.model
    Class
    Description
    Bookshelf
    The bookshelf class represents personal bookshelf of each player
    CardsBag
    CardsBag class represents the physical bag in the game, containing all the tiles that are then placed on the LivingRoomBoard
    CommonGoalCard
    The abstract class CommonGoalCard provides all the behaviour that are common between the 12 common goal cards
    Game
    Game class contains the actual game, identified by an id and containing all the necessary items to play
    GoalCard
    The abstract class CommonGoalCard provides all the behaviour that are common between personal and common goal cards
    LivingRoomBoard
    LivingRoomBoard class represents the living room board on which the game is played
    ObjectCard
    ObjectCard class represents the cards placed in the tiles on the LivingRoomBoard
    PersonalGoalCard
    PersonalGoalCard class represents the personal goal card in the physical game
    Player
    Player class represents the single player
    PointCard
    PointCard reflects the actual PointCard in the game, with a roman numeral on the back
    RomanNumeral
    RomanNumeral class allows to use roman numerals to reflect the real game
    Tile
    Tile's class represents the tiles: each square in the LivingRoomBoard that may have on top (contain) an ObjectCard
    Type
    Type's class is used to associate each type to a specific color and allow to refer to each type with his name
    Value
    Value class is used to set the value of PointCard
